title: Designing with everyday materials: corrugated paper
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media and Jack Stoops Productions
brief_description: Presents the construction of imaginative and varied art projects from corrugated paper. Shows the materials and tools required, the techniques of cutting and joining, and the design possibilities in working with this material.
creator_credit_for_label: BFA Educational Media and Jack Stoops Productions
description: Presents the construction of imaginative and varied art projects from corrugated paper. Shows the materials and tools required, the techniques of cutting and joining, and the design possibilities in working with this material.
